title: RPG Character Voices
longDescription:
Hello everyone!


This pack I made thinking about races that are most common in RPG games, but that are also used in many other genres.


Orcs, Trolls, Goblins, Humans and Angels.


All these races will have vocal sounds that I tried to isolate, take a look at the full list and preview :)

Every folder contains 3 versions of the sounds :)


  • AngelAttack_v1
  • AngelDead_v1
  • AngelHum_v1
  • AngelHurt_v1
  • AngelLaugh_v1
  • ElfAttack_v1
  • ElfDead_v1
  • ElfHum_v1
  • ElfHurt_v1
  • ElfLaugh_v1
  • GoblinAttack_v1
  • GoblinDead_v1
  • GoblinHurt_v1
  • GoblinLaugh_v1
  • GoblinSpeaking_v1
  • HumanAttack_v1
  • HumanDead_v1
  • HumanGrump_v1
  • HumanHurt_v1
  • HumanLaugh_v1
  • OrcAttack_v1
  • OrcDying_v1
  • OrcHurt_v1
  • OrcLaugh_v1
  • OrcSpeaking_v1
  • TrollAttack_v1
  • TrollDead_v1
  • TrollLaugh_v1
  • TrollSpeaking_v1
  • Troll_Hurt_v1
  • UndeadAttack_v1
  • UndeadDying_v1
  • UndeadHurt_v1
  • UndeadLaugh_v1
  • UndeadNoises_v1

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 105

Number of Audio Cues: 105

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: The font is Grusskarten Gotisch free distributed for commercial use by 1001 fonts and the images is from pixabay, also free for commercial use.
